content: lenore combines lumi and aerial yarns to create a stunning crocheted lace shawl choose your favorite shades to create your own shawl and take advantage of the way this versatile design can effortlessly shift from sweet to rock chic finished measurements approximately 54 / 137 cm across top edge x 32 / 81 cm down center yarn berroco lumi 50 grs 5 balls #8155 stone wall berroco aerial 25 grs 3 balls #3462 raven hooks and notions crochet hook size i / 5 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 13 double_crochet and 7 row = 4 / 10 cm in double_crochet gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge
